segments.text: I find myself smiling at the sheer audacity of these children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've got a whole operation going on behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is a master climber, scaling that stool like a tiny mountaineer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in that "COOKIE JAR," a treasure hunter indeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl, with her raised hand, is eagerly awaiting her bounty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've chosen the perfect moment, with the adult completely distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bold move, and I have to admire their coordination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, sneaking cookies like this is definitely against the rules, I imagine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me feels a pang of irritation at their sneaky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really should ask first, or at least wait for an appropriate time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then, who can resist a full cookie jar?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their faces must be full of mischievous delight right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their suppressed giggles as they carry out their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Theyâ€™re a real team, these two, united by a sugary goal.
segments.speaker: PAR
